00024     SpinField( string fieldLabel, bool fieldRequired, bool fieldReset );
00025     
00026 
00028     /*
00029       \param minimum is the lowest possible value. If the pointer is equal to NULL there is no limit.
00030       \param maximum is the highest possible value. If the pointer is equal to NULL there is no limit.
00031       \param stepsize is the increment size of the field. Should not be equal to 0 unless adStep equals FALSE, in this way only manual entries are possible.
00032       \param adStep indicates if manually entered values are rounded to the nearest multiplication of the step size.
00033       \param decimals is the number of decimals visible in the field.
00034       \param adDec indicates if manually entered values are displayed according to the value of decimals. If FALSE the fully entered value is displayed.
00035     */
00036     SpinField( string fieldLabel, bool fieldRequired, bool fieldReset, double* minimum, 
00037               double* maximum, double stepsize, bool adStep, int decimals, bool adDec );
